short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save web pages and highlights to Nano Page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nano Page is a social note taking tool. This chrome extension allows users to quickly post any web page they visit to their daily notes in Nano Page. It will automatically add in the title and URL of the webpage and if they highlight a section of the web page it will include it as a quote. It will allow users to edit the note before posting like adding in double brackets to denote topics or adding in hashtags.
